title: Lesson 85
paragraph: This lesson focuses on humanity and compassion, highlighting altruistic, benevolent, and philanthropic behavior.

words.example: The benevolent teacher helped all her students.

words.meaning: showing an ability to understand and share the feelings of others
words.japaneseMeaning: 共感的な、思いやりのある
words.example: She was empathetic toward her friend’s struggles.

words.meaning: showing a selfless concern for the well-being of others
having a kind and sympathetic nature
words.example: She is kindhearted and always helps others.
He was magnanimous toward his opponents.

words.japaneseMeaning: 人道的な、思いやりのある
words.example: The organization promotes humane treatment of animals.

words.meaning: seeking to promote the welfare of others
words.example: The philanthropic donor funded hospitals and schools.

words.meaning: generous in giving to those in need
words.japaneseMeaning: 慈善的な、思いやりのある
words.example: She is charitable and volunteers regularly.

words.meaning: willing to give more of something than necessary
words.example: He was generous with his time and money.
She was forgiving toward those who wronged her.
